name: npm-build-boilerplate
description: A set of common build tasks written with npm scripts.
author: Jimmy Briggs <jimmy.briggs@jimbrig.com>

scripts.uglify: mkdirp dist/js -p && uglifyjs src/js/*.js -m -o dist/js/app.js && uglifyjs src/js/*.js -m -c -o dist/js/app.min.js
scripts.icons: svgo -f src/images/icons -o dist/images/icons && svg-sprite-generate -d dist/images/icons -o dist/images/icons/sprite.svg
scripts.patch-release: npm version patch && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.minor-release: npm version minor && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.major-release: npm version major && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.cleanup:
git reset && echo '/node_modules/' > .gitignore && git add .gitignore && git stash save --include-untracked --keep-index '`npm run clean-up` trash can' && git clean --force -d && git reset --hard && echo '
clean-up: All unstaged and ignored files within your git repo – except node_modules/* – have been moved to the stash. To restore them run `git stash pop --quiet; git checkout .gitignore`.
scripts.update-ghpages: git push origin `git subtree split --prefix docs master`:gh-pages --force
scripts.precommit: npm run generate && git add README.md
scripts.update-readme: echo 'Updating the readme…'; doxie --render < ./scripts.json --inject into README.md && echo '…done!'
scripts.update-toc:
echo 'Updating the table of contents…'; doxie --render .doxie.render.toc.js < ./scripts.json --append '
' --inject into README.md as toc && echo '…done!'
scripts.generate: npm run update-readme; npm run update-toc
